author: adminelevation
description: Validated ways to save money, earn more money, and get discounts on products. Explore offers on banking, hosting, electronics, and more - 100% legitimate, 100% organized just for you.
install_msg: Thanks for installing offers! Load the cog using `[p]load offers`, then use `[p]offers` to browse available offers.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
name: Offers
